MonsterTrait.Name: Flyby
MonsterTrait.Text: The ala doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MonsterTrait.Name: Poison Flesh
MonsterTrait.Text: The ala's poison infuses its flesh. A creature that makes a successful bite attack against an ala must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw; if it fails, the creature takes 10 (3d6) poison damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Storm's Strength
MonsterTrait.Text: If an electrical storm is raging around an ala and its target, the saving throw against Lightning's Kiss is made with disadvantage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The ala makes two claw attacks or one claw and one bite attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Lightning's Kiss (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: One target within 50 feet must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. It takes 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
